## Basic data summary
##### Data in edit_data_2.csv has shorter column headers, skill levels --> integers
Load data:
```{r}
setwd('/Users/ianjohnson/Desktop/Columbia/EDAV/Project1') # Should remove?
df = read.csv("edit_data_2.csv")
```
Show a summary of the data:
```{r}
summary(df)
```
Plot R experience level against Github experience level:
```{r}
hist(df$r_data_modeling_experience, binwidth=1)
hist(df$github_experience, binwidth=1)
```
